snippet: The deal, involving the two largest makers of dental products, would create a dental health giant with a combined market value of $13.3 billion.
abstract: Dentsply announces acquisition of Sirona Dental Systems for $5.5 billion in deal that creates massive dental products company worth about $13.3 billion.

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. de la MERCED

lead_paragraph: The deal, involving the two largest makers of dental products, would create a dental health giant with a combined market value of $13.3 billion.

headline.main: Dentsply to Acquire Sirona Dental for $5.5 Billion
headline.print_headline: Business Briefing; Dentsply and Sirona Dental to Merge in $13.3 Billion Deal
